data.text:
@ACH13975804 I was referring to reliable sources😊. The links attached indicates that https://t.co/38EusJ7xKf is misleading, inaccurate and incorrect by debunking its top conspiracies. Avoid getting your sources off that website as you're doing more harm than good. 

https://t.co/o0evxBRhQj
@andreas_mifsud Uh that would be the source listed right on the graph...
@ACH13975804 May I have the links to such sources, please?
@andreas_mifsud The numbers/stats have inverted dramatically now. OAS/VAIDS/ADE well underway.

@ACH13975804 The following graphs have more detailed data and show COVID- 19 deaths by vaccination status in England from January - June 2021 and July - December 2021. (The graphs have a different scale)

https://t.co/a9gtmLoMxP https://t.co/VT36ULGfuf

@ACH13975804 The data in that graph is false and simply makes no sense. Also, https://t.co/lnLzOXr3ZT is an unreliable website that has been suspended from Twitter multiple times for spreading COVID- 19 misinformation. Below is a graph that shows how the numbers actually are. https://t.co/7D5uqxTCPq
